text: The John J. Moran Medium Security Facility is a medium-security state men's prison in Cranston, Rhode Island, owned and operated by the Rhode Island Department of Corrections. The facility opened in 1992, and has an operational capacity of 1006 prisoners. ==References== ==External links== *John J. Moran Medium Security Facility Category:Prisons in Rhode Island Category:Buildings and structures in Cranston, Rhode Island Category:1992 establishments in Rhode Island
title: John J. Moran Medium Security Facility
